Title: Brazil
Writer: Terry Gilliam (screenplay by), Tom Stoppard (screenplay by), Charles McKeown (screenplay by)
Actors: Jonathan Pryce, Robert De Niro, Katherine Helmond, Ian Holm
Plot: A bureaucrat in a dystopic society becomes an enemy of the state as he pursues the woman of his dreams.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 8 wins & 3 nominations.
